sen.j: 特記事項
sen.e: Remarks
Remarks
Remarks

sen.j: 久御山町（くみやまちょう）は、京都府南部、久世郡に位置する町。
sen.e: Kumiyama-cho is a town located in Kuse-gun in the southern part of Kyoto Prefecture.
Kumiyama-cho is a town located in Kuse-gun in the southern part of Kyoto Prefecture.
Kumiyama-cho is a town located in Kuse-gun in the southern part of Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 地理
sen.e: Geography
Geography
Geography

sen.j: 町域は全体的に、巨椋池を干拓した平地である。
sen.e: The town area is wholly a flatland formed after the reclamation of Ogura-ike Pond.
The town area is all flatland formed after the reclamation of Ogura-ike Pond.
The town area is all flatland formed after the reclamation of Ogura-ike Pond.

sen.j: 河川 町の北部に淀川、町の南部に木津川 (京都府)。
sen.e: River: The Yodo-gawa River runs in the northern part of the town, and the Kizu-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) runs in the southern part of the town.
River: The Yodo-gawa River runs in the northern part of the town, and the Kizu-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) runs in the southern part of the town.
River: The Yodo-gawa River runs in the northern part of the town, and the Kizu-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) runs in the southern part of the town.

sen.j: 宇治川は主に京都市との境界線を形成し、木津川は城陽市・八幡市との境界線を形成している。
sen.e: The Uji-gawa River mainly forms a border with Kyoto City, and the Kizu-gawa River forms a border with Joyo City and Yawata City.
The Uji-gawa River mainly forms a border with Kyoto City, and the Kizu-gawa River forms a border with Joyo City and Yawata City.
The Uji-gawa River mainly forms a border with Kyoto City, and the Kizu-gawa River forms a border with Joyo City and Yawata City.

sen.j: 京都盆地の東西中心線上にあり、盆地を形成する北・東・西の山地から離れている関係で気候は穏やか。
sen.e: Kumiyama-cho is located on the east-west central line in the Kyoto Basin, and its climate is mild because the town is far from the northern, eastern and western mountains forming the basin.
Kumiyama-cho is located on the east-west central line in the Kyoto Basin, with a mild climate due to the town being far from the northern, eastern and western mountains forming the basin.
Kumiyama-cho is located on the east-west central line in the Kyoto Basin, with a mild climate due to the town being far from the northern, eastern and western mountains forming the basin.

sen.j: 京都市内の夏の蒸し暑さは全国的に知られているが、久御山町の場合、町の北部を覆う広大な干拓田が一種の冷却装置として作用し、若干涼しく感じられる。
sen.e: The steamy heat in summer in Kyoto City is known nationwide, but, Kumiyama-cho is a little cooler because a broad reclamated field covering the northern part of the town works as a kind of cooling equipment.

The steamy heat in summer in Kyoto City is known nationwide, but, Kumiyama-cho is a little cooler because of a broad reclamated field covering the northern part of the town which works to cool the area.

The steamy heat in summer in Kyoto City is known nationwide, but, Kumiyama-cho is a little cooler because of a broad reclaimed field covering the northern part of the town which works to cool the area.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 冬季においては山が遠いため、隣接する地域で小雪が降る場合でも、久御山町では降らないことがある。
sen.e: Because mountains are far away, Kumiyama-cho may have no snow in winter even if a sprinkling of snow falls in the neighboring area.
Because mountains are far away, Kumiyama-cho may have no snow in winter even if a sprinkling of snow falls in neighboring areas.
Because mountains are far away, Kumiyama-cho may have no snow in winter even if a sprinkling of snow falls in neighboring areas.

sen.j: 「三郷山財産区」と呼ばれる飛地が宇治市と宇治田原町の隣接する地域に存在する。
sen.e: An isolated enclave called 'Misato-yama Mountain Property District' exists in the area adjacent to Uji City and Ujitawara-cho.
An isolated enclave called 'Misato-yama Mountain Property District' exists in the area adjacent to Uji City and Ujitawara-cho.
An isolated enclave called 'Misato-yama Mountain Property District' exists in the area adjacent to Uji City and Ujitawara-cho.

sen.j: 定住者は居らず、京都府の施設「府民スポーツ広場(通称みどりが丘)」として用いられている。
sen.e: The isolated enclave has no fixed domicile residents, and is used as a facility of Kyoto Prefecture, 'Sports Square for residents of a prefecture (commonly called Midorigaoka).'
The isolated enclave has no fixed domicile residents, and is used as a facility of Kyoto Prefecture, 'Sports Square for residents of a prefecture (commonly called Midorigaoka).'
The isolated enclave has no fixed domicile residents, and is used as a facility of Kyoto Prefecture, 'Sports Square for residents of a prefecture (commonly called Midorigaoka).'

sen.j: 1988年の京都国民体育大会では馬術の競技会場となった。
sen.e: The equestrian events were held here in the Kyoto National Sports Festival in 1988.
Equestrian events were held here in the Kyoto National Sports Festival in 1988.
Equestrian events were held here in the Kyoto National Sports Festival in 1988.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1954年（昭和29年）10月1日 佐山村と御牧村が合併して久御山町となる。
sen.e: On October 1, 1954, Kumiyama-cho was formed by merger between Sayama-mura and Mimaki-mura.
On October 1, 1954, Kumiyama-cho was formed by a merger between Sayama-mura and Mimaki-mura.
October 1, 1954: Kumiyama-cho was formed by a merger between Sayama-mura and Mimaki-mura.

sen.j: 町名は「久世郡」「御牧村｣「佐山村」から採った。
sen.e: The town was named after 'Kuse-gun,' 'Mimaki-mura' and 'Sayama-mura.'
The town was named after 'Kuse-gun,' 'Mimaki-mura' and 'Sayama-mura.'
The town was named after 'Kuse-gun,' 'Mimaki-mura' and 'Sayama-mura.'

sen.j: 久御山町合併に先立ち、1951年（昭和26年）、久世郡を構成している宇治町、槇島村、小倉村、大久保村、と宇治郡東宇治町の2町3村が合併して宇治市が誕生した。
sen.e: Before the merger of Kumiyama-cho, Uji City was formed in 1951 through a merger of the following two towns (pronounced as "cho" in Japanese in this case) and three villages (pronounced as "mura" in Japanese): Uji-cho, Makishima-mura, Ogura-mura and Okubo-mura which composed Kuse-gun, and Higashi-Uji-cho, Uji-gun.
sen.cmt: 2町3村→two towns (pronounced as "cho" in Japanese in this case) and three villages (pronounced as "mura" in Japanese)[Uji-cho等の"cho"が町を指し、Makishima-mura等の"mura"が村を指すことを示すために、説明を付しました]
sen.e: Before the merger of Kumiyama-cho, Uji City was formed in 1951 through a merger of the following two towns (pronounced as "cho" in Japanese in this case) and three villages (pronounced as "mura" in Japanese): Uji-cho, Makishima-mura, Ogura-mura and Okubo-mura which composed Kuse-gun, and Higashi-Uji-cho, Uji-gun.

Before the merger of Kumiyama-cho, Uji City was formed in 1951 through a merger of the following two towns (pronounced as "cho" in Japanese in this case) and three villages (pronounced as "mura" in Japanese): Uji-cho, Makishima-mura, Ogura-mura and Okubo-mura which composed Kuse-gun, and Higashi-Uji-cho, Uji-gun.

sen.j: その後城陽市が1972年（昭和47年）に市制移行により久世郡は1町のみとなった。
sen.e: Subsequently, Joyo City was organized as a municipality in 1972, and only one town remained in Kuse-gun.
Subsequently, Joyo City was organized as a municipality in 1972, and only one town remained in Kuse-gun.
Subsequently, Joyo City was organized as a municipality in 1972, and only one town remained in Kuse-gun.

sen.e: Town mayor: Nobuo SAKAMOTO as of January 2007 (since August 2000)

sen.j: 農業
sen.e: Agriculture
Agriculture
Agriculture

sen.j: 町域の北半分は巨椋池干拓田という広い稲作地帯となっている。
sen.e: An extensive rice-growing area called Ogura-ike Reclaimed Land lies in the half part on the north of the town area.
An extensive rice-growing area called Ogura-ike Reclaimed Land lies in the northern half of the town area.
An extensive rice-growing area called Ogura-ike Reclaimed Land lies in the northern half of the town area.

sen.j: 国道1号線より西側では近郊農業が盛んである。
sen.e: Suburban agriculture is active in the western part of Route 1.
Suburban agriculture is active in the western part of Route 1.
Suburban agriculture is active in the western part of National Route 1.
sen.cmt: 国道→national route としました。

sen.j: 特に大根は「淀大根」という地域ブランドとなっている。
sen.e: Especially, Japanese radish named 'Yodo Daikon Japanese radish' is designated as a regional brand.
The Japanese radish named 'Yodo Daikon Japanese radish' has been designated as a regional brand.
The Japanese radish named 'Yodo Daikon Japanese radish' has been designated as a regional brand.

sen.j: 国道1号線が町内を貫通している関係で、消費地に素早く出荷できる。
sen.e: Products can be shipped to consuming regions immediately because Route 1 runs through the town.
Products can be shipped to other regions immediately because Route 1 runs through the town.
Products can be shipped to other regions immediately because National Route 1 runs through the town.
sen.cmt: 国道→national route としました。

sen.j: 久御山町の農業の発展に道路網は大きく貢献しており、2000年代になって相次いで開通した新しい道路網により、今後の見通しは明るい。
sen.e: The road network greatly contributes to the development of agriculture in Kumiyama-cho, and new road networks which opened in succession in 2000s brighten the outlook.
The road network greatly contributes to the development of agriculture in Kumiyama-cho, and new road networks which opened in the 2000s are brightening its prospects.
The road network greatly contributes to the development of agriculture in Kumiyama-cho, and new road networks which opened in the 2000s are brightening its prospects.

sen.j: 近年開業した大規模小売店舗の敷地内にも久御山町の野菜の直販コーナーが設けられ、徐々に知名度が上がりリピーターを確保する程までに成長している。
sen.e: Because of an outlet store for vegetables of Kumiyama-cho established within the premises of a recently-opened large-scale retail store, the name recognition increased gradually, and the agriculture grow to the extent of ensuring repeat customers.

Because of an outlet store for vegetables of Kumiyama-cho established within the premises of a recently-opened large-scale retail store, the area's name recognition increased gradually, until it experienced growth through establishing repeat customers.

Because of an outlet store for vegetables of Kumiyama-cho established within the premises of a recently-opened large-scale retail store, the area's name recognition increased gradually, until it experienced growth through establishing repeat customers.

sen.j: 工業
sen.e: Industry
Industry
Industry

sen.j: 町内に久御山工業団地があり、主として金属加工・プラスチック加工、食品製造などの事業所が多い。
sen.e: The Kumiyama Industrial Park exists in the town, and has many business offices mainly related to metal processing, plastic processing and food manufacturing.
The Kumiyama Industrial Park located in the town, has many business offices mainly related to metal processing, plastic processing and food manufacturing.
The Kumiyama Industrial Park located in the town, has many business offices mainly related to metal processing, plastic processing and food manufacturing.

sen.j: 町内（および周辺域）で「横受け」と呼ばれる業務連携が定着しており、会社の枠を超えた人的交流が見られる。
sen.e: Since a business alliance called 'Yokouke' is settled in the town (and surrounding area), human exchanges beyond the frame of company are carried out.
A business alliance called 'Yokouke' is standard fare in the town (and surrounding area), and interaction of people between that of the local industries can be seen.
A business alliance called 'Yokouke' is standard fare in the town (and surrounding area), and interaction of people between that of the local industries can be seen.

sen.j: 有名企業の工場が多くあり、新しい道路網が使えるようになり、さらに工業面での期待がふくらんでいる。
sen.e: The existence of many plants of famous companies and availability of new road network raise expectations for the industry.
The existence of many plants by famous companies and the availability of new road networks have raised expectations for the industry.
The existence of many plants by famous companies and the availability of new road networks have raised expectations for the industry.

sen.j: 一部の大きな工場では地方からの「留学生」を受け入れている。
sen.e: Some of large plants receive students from other regions.
sen.cmt: 地方からの「留学生」→students from other regions[留学生の英訳"overseas students"を使用することによる『地方にいる海外からの留学生』との誤解を避けるため]
sen.e: Some of the larger plants receive students from other regions.
Some of the larger plants receive students from other regions.

sen.j: これは地方で工業を営む家の子が学校を卒業した後、現場実践を通じて事業承継に耐えうる技術を身につけさせるために久御山町の事業所に数年間送り込むというものである。
sen.e: This is a system that families operating industries in some region dispatch their children to the business offices in Kumiyama-cho for several years after the graduation from schools, in order for such children to master technologies making it possible to succeed their parents' business, through on-site practice.

This system allow families operating industries in another region to dispatch their children to the business offices in Kumiyama-cho for several years after the graduating school, in order to allow them to master technologies, and bring success to their parents' business through on-site practice.

This system allow families operating industries in another region to dispatch their children to the business offices in Kumiyama-cho for several years after graduating school, in order to allow them to master technologies, and bring success to their parents' business through on-site practice.
sen.cmt: 文中のthe graduating のthe を削除しました。

sen.j: 久御山町内の工業事業所は黒煙を吐き続けるようなものがなく、環境負荷は比較的小さいといえる。
sen.e: Since Kumiyama-cho has no industrial establishment emitting black smoke, its environmental burden is comparatively small.
Since Kumiyama-cho has no industrial establishment that emits black smoke, its environmental burden is comparatively small.
Since Kumiyama-cho has no industrial establishment that emits black smoke, its environmental burden is comparatively small.

sen.j: また工業は久御山町の財政に大きく貢献し、地方交付税を受けない健全財政を支えている。
sen.e: As the industry greatly contributes to the finance of Kumiyama-cho, and supports its balanced budget, Kumiyama-cho does not need to receive any local allocation tax.
As the industry greatly contributes to the finance of Kumiyama-cho, and supports its balanced budget, Kumiyama-cho does not need to receive any local allocation tax.
As the industry greatly contributes to the finance of Kumiyama-cho, and supports its balanced budget, Kumiyama-cho does not need to receive any local allocation tax.

sen.j: 工業の力が商業に大きく勝っている関係で、工業系事業所の経済団体として久御山町工業会が長く運営されてきたが、2003年に工業会が商工会と統合した。
sen.e: Because the industrial power is much stronger than the commercial power, the Kumiyama-cho Industry Association was operated as an economic organization of industrial establishments for a long time, but, it was integrated with the commercial association in 2003.

Because its industrial power is much stronger than its commercial power, the Kumiyama-cho Industry Association operated as an economic organization of industrial establishments for a long time, but, was integrated with the commercial association in 2003.

Because its industrial power is much stronger than its commercial power, the Kumiyama-cho Industry Association operated as an economic organization of industrial establishments for a long time, but, was integrated with the commercial association in 2003.

sen.j: その結果、より濃密な企業間交流が促進されることにつながっている。
sen.e: The result leads to the promotion of more dense exchanges among companies.
The result lead to the promotion of more dense exchanges among companies.
The result has led to the promotion of more dense exchanges among companies.

sen.j: 商業
sen.e: Commerce
Commerce
Commerce

sen.j: かつては個人商店や小規模な食品スーパーと、国道1号線沿線にガソリンスタンド・中古車販売店がいくつかあるくらいで、商業面が弱く、宇治市や京都市に多く依存していた。
sen.e: The commerce used to be weak because there were only noncorporate stores, small-scale food supermarket, and gas stations and used car dealerships along Route 1, and used to rely heavily on Uji City and Kyoto City, but,

Commerce used to be weak due to the existence of only noncorporate stores, small-scale food supermarket, gas stations and used car dealerships along Route 1, and used to rely heavily on Uji City and Kyoto City, but,

sen.j: しかしジャスコ久御山店、ロックタウン久御山店などの大規模な商業施設がオープンしてからは逆に周辺市町からの来客も発生し、商業面が強化された。
sen.e: conversely, after the opening of large-scale commercial facilities such as JUSCO KUMIYAMA, LOC TOWN KUMIYAMA, people came from surrounding municipalities, and the commerce was strengthened.
conversely, after the opening of large-scale commercial facilities such as JUSCO KUMIYAMA, LOC TOWN KUMIYAMA, people came from surrounding municipalities, and commerce was strengthened.

sen.j: しかしそれと同時に、従来から営業していた小規模な商店は壊滅的な状態に陥った。
sen.e: However, at the same time, small-scale conventional stores fell into collapse.
However, at the same time, small-scale conventional stores collapsed.
However, at the same time, small-scale conventional stores collapsed.

sen.j: 地元資本のスーパーでは、スーパーイワキが健闘している。
sen.e: A local supermarket, Super Iwaki, makes a good showing.
A local supermarket, Super Iwaki, is still surviving.

sen.j: 漁業
sen.e: Fishery
Fishery
Fishery

sen.j: 巨椋池が干拓されるまで、この地域は豊かな漁場だった。
sen.e: This area used to be a rich fishing ground before Ogura-ike Pond was reclaimed.
This area used to be a rich fishing ground before Ogura-ike Pond was reclaimed.
This area used to be a rich fishing ground before Ogura-ike Pond was reclaimed.

sen.j: 船の出入りする場所は協定されるが、一旦船を出したら獲れるだけ獲ってよいという説があるほど多種多様な淡水魚の宝庫だった。
sen.e: Although a place for a boat to enter and leave was decided under the agreement, it was a mine of different freshwater fish as it was told that any boat could catch fish as much as possible after leaving.

Although the entrance for boats was decided under the agreement, the area held such an abundant supply of different freshwater fish that it was said that any boat was allowed to catch as much fish as possible after leaving.

Although the entrance for boats was decided under the agreement, the area held such an abundant supply of different freshwater fish that it was said that any boat was allowed to catch as much fish as possible after leaving.

sen.j: 度重なる水害にかかわらず人々が去らなかったのはこの恵みによるものである。
sen.e: Because of benefits from this, people did not leave here even though floods occurred repeatedly.
Because of these benefits from this, people did not leave the area despite recurring floods.
Because of these benefits from this, people did not leave the area despite recurring floods.

sen.j: 巨椋池が干拓された時点で漁業の歴史は終結し、農業に転換された。
sen.e: The history of fishery ended when the Ogura-ike Pond was reclaimed, and the agriculture took the place of fishery.
Its fishery history ended when the Ogura-ike Pond was reclaimed, and agriculture replaced fishing.
Its fishery history ended when the Ogura-ike Pond was reclaimed, and agriculture replaced fishing.

sen.j: 京阪電鉄が八幡市～淀間の久御山町域をほんのわずか横切っているものの、駅は設けられていない。
sen.e: Keihan Electric Railway operated between Yawata City and Yodo runs through a small area of Kumiyama-cho, but no station is established.

Bus route
Bus routes

sen.j: 京阪電気鉄道淀駅・中書島駅、近鉄京都線大久保駅 (京都府)などからバス路線がある。
sen.e: Bus services are operated from Yodo Station and Chushojima Station on the Keihan Electric Railway, and from Okubo Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line (Kyoto Prefecture).
Bus services are operated from Yodo Station and Chushojima Station on the Keihan Electric Railway, and from Okubo Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line (Kyoto Prefecture).
Bus services are operated from Yodo Station and Chushojima Station on the Keihan Electric Railway, and from Okubo Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line (Kyoto Prefecture).

sen.j: 主に京阪宇治バス・京阪シティバスの、京阪淀駅から久御山町役場・近鉄大久保経由、京阪宇治駅 (京阪)ゆきが多い。
sen.e: Bus services are mainly operated by Keihan Uji Bus Co., Ltd. and Keihan City Bus from Keihan Yodo Station to Keihan Uji Station (Keihan) via Kumiyama-cho town office and Kintetsu Okubo.

sen.j: また京阪中書島駅からのバスも頻発している。
sen.e: Bus services are frequently operated from Keihan Chushojima Station.
Bus services are frequently operated from Keihan Chushojima Station.
Bus services are frequently operated from Keihan Chushojima Station.

sen.j: 淀駅とジャスコ久御山・久御山町役場を結ぶ京阪バスなどの西循環バス、東循環バスも走っている。
sen.e: Services of westbound circulating bus and eastbound circulating bus operated by Keihan Bus Co., Ltd. connect among Yodo Station, JUSCO KUMIYAMA and Kumiyama-cho town office.
Westbound circulating bus services and eastbound circulating bus services operated by Keihan Bus Co., Ltd. connect among Yodo Station, JUSCO KUMIYAMA and Kumiyama-cho town office.
Westbound circulating bus services and eastbound circulating bus services operated by Keihan Bus Co., Ltd. connect among Yodo Station, JUSCO KUMIYAMA and Kumiyama-cho town office.

sen.j: 町営の循環バスも走っている。
sen.e: Circulating bus services are also operated by the town.
Circulating bus services are also operated by the town.
Circulating bus services are also operated by the town.

sen.j: 各路線とも本数が比較的多く、利用しやすい。
sen.e: The accessibility is good because comparatively many buses run for each route.
The area has good accessibility due to the comparatively large number of buses which run through each route.
The area has good accessibility due to the comparatively large number of buses which run through each route.

sen.j: 荒見神社（延喜式神名帳）
sen.e: Arami-jinja Shrine (Engi Shiki Jinmyo Cho; list of nationwide shrines as of 927)
Arami-jinja Shrine (Engi Shiki Jinmyo Cho; list of nationwide shrines as of 927)
Arami-jinja Shrine (Engi Shiki Jinmyo Cho; list of nationwide shrines as of 927)

sen.j: 社殿は江戸時代に再建。
sen.e: The shrine pavilions were built during the Edo period.
The shrine pavilions were built during the Edo period.
The shrine pavilions were built during the Edo period.

sen.j: 入口には幕末七卿の1人である東久世通禧が起毛した社標が建てられている。
sen.e: A shrine sign designed by Michitomi HIGASHIKUZE, one of seven nobilities during the late Tokugawa shogunate, is established at the entrance.
A shrine sign designed by Michitomi HIGASHIKUZE, one of seven nobilities during the late Tokugawa shogunate, is established at the entrance.
A shrine sign designed by Michitomi HIGASHIKUZE, one of seven nobilities during the late Tokugawa shogunate, is established at the entrance.

sen.j: また、この地が題材となったと思われる、万葉集九巻に収録されている歌「巨椋の入江響むなり射目人の伏見が田井に雁渡るらし」が刻まれた歌碑も建立されている。
sen.e: There is also a monument engraved with a poem in Vol. 9 of Manyo-shu, 'Gaggling of geese resonate on Okura-ike Pond, a hunter aims at geese flying to the paddy field in Fushimi,' which showed the landscape of this place.

There is also a monument engraved with a poem in Vol. 9 of Manyo-shu, 'Gaggling of geese resonate on Okura-ike Pond, a hunter aims at geese flying to the paddy field in Fushimi,' which showed the landscape of this place.

There is also a monument engraved with a poem in the volume nine of Manyo-shu (Collection of Ten Thousand Leaves), 'Gaggling of geese resonate on Okura-ike Pond, a hunter aims at geese flying to the paddy field in Fushimi,' which showed the landscape of this place.
sen.cmt: 万葉集の補足をしました。

sen.j: 上津屋橋（通称流れ橋）
sen.e: Kozuya-bashi Bridge (commonly called Nagare Bashi; floating bridge)
Kozuya-bashi Bridge (commonly called Nagare Bashi; floating bridge)
Kozuya-bashi Bridge (commonly called Nagare Bashi; floating bridge)

sen.j: 木津川 (京都府)に架かり、対岸の八幡市とを結ぶ木造橋。
sen.e: A wooden bridge over the Kizu-kawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) connects with Yawata City on the opposite bank.
A wooden bridge over the Kizu-kawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) connects with Yawata City on the opposite bank.
A wooden bridge over the Kizu-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) connects with Yawata City on the opposite bank.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 増水時に橋桁が流される構造で有名。
sen.e: This bridge is famous as its structure of flowing bridge girders when the river water increases.
This bridge is famous for having bridge girders which wash away when the river water increases.
This bridge is famous for having bridge girders which wash away when the river water increases.

sen.j: 時代劇の撮影も時々行われる。
sen.e: Samurai dramas are sometimes shot here.
Samurai dramas are sometimes shot here.
Samurai dramas are sometimes shot here.

sen.j: その他
sen.e: Others
Others
Others

sen.j: 久御山町では2つの市外局番が用いられている。
sen.e: Two area codes are used in Kumiyama-cho.
Two area codes are used in Kumiyama-cho.
Two area codes are used in Kumiyama-cho.

sen.j: 若干の例外はあるが、御牧小学校区が075-63x（NTT淀ビル収容）、佐山・東角小学校区は0774-4x（NTT新田別館収容）の区域になる。
sen.e: Although there are some exceptions, the area code for the Mimaki Elementary School District is 075-63x (under the control of NTT Yodo Building), and that for the Sayama and Tozumi Elementary School District is 0774-4x (under the control of NTT Shinden Bekkan Annex).

Although there are some exceptions, the area code for the Mimaki Elementary School District is 075-63x (under the control of NTT Yodo Building), and that for the Sayama and Tozumi Elementary School District is 0774-4x (under the control of NTT Shinden Bekkan Annex).

Although there are some exceptions, the area code for the Mimaki Elementary School District is 075-63x (under the control of NTT Yodo Building), and that for the Sayama and Tozumi Elementary School Districts is 0774-4x (under the control of NTT Shinden Bekkan Annex).

sen.j: 両者の接点に久御山町役場があるので、役場には075と0774双方の電話回線が導入されている。
sen.e: Since the Kumiyama-cho town office is located at the connecting point of both districts, both area codes of 075 and 0774 are applied to the town office.
Since the Kumiyama-cho town office is located at the connecting point of both districts, both the area codes of 075 and 0774 are applied to the town office.
Since the Kumiyama-cho town office is located at the connecting point of both districts, both the area codes of 075 and 0774 are applied to the town office.

sen.j: これは弊害を伴った。
sen.e: This brought harmful results.
This brought harmful results.
This brought harmful results.

sen.j: 0774-4xは宇治市の南部（広野町、大久保町、伊勢田町など）にも用いられており、久御山町の当該区域から119を回すと宇治市の消防本部につながってしまい、本来通話したい久御山町の消防本部につながらなかった。
sen.e: Since the area code, 0774-4x, is also used in the southern part (Hirono-machi, Okubo-cho, Iseda-cho, etc.) of Uji City, when dialing 119 from the relevant area in Kumiyama-cho, the phone is connected to the Fire Department of Uji City, but not connected to the Fire Department of Kumiyama-cho which people in Kumiyama-cho want to call.

Since the area code, 0774-4x, is also used in the southern part (Hirono-machi, Okubo-cho, Iseda-cho, etc.) of Uji City, when dialing 119 from the relevant area in Kumiyama-cho, the phone is connected to the Fire Department of Uji City, but not connected to the Fire Department of Kumiyama-cho which people in Kumiyama-cho want to call.

Since the area code, 0774-4x, is also used in the southern part (Hirono-machi, Okubo-cho, Iseda-cho, etc.) of Uji City, when dialing 119 from the relevant area in Kumiyama-cho, the phone is connected to the Fire Department of Uji City, but not connected to the Fire Department of Kumiyama-cho which people in Kumiyama-cho want to call.

sen.j: この回避策として、当該区域には119ではない普通の電話番号として久御山町の消防本部にかける方法が提供され、大きな文字で印刷したシールが各戸に配布された。
sen.e: As a measure to solve this problem, an ordinary telephone number, not 119, is informed to the residents in the relevant area as a telephone number to call the Fire Department of Kumiyama-cho, and a seal on which such telephone number is printed in big letters is distributed to each household.

To solve this problem, an ordinary telephone number, not 119, was provided to residents in the relevant area as a telephone number to call the Fire Department of Kumiyama-cho, and a sticker bearing the telephone number in big letters is distributed to each household.

To solve this problem, an ordinary telephone number, not 119, was provided to residents in the relevant area as a telephone number to call the Fire Department of Kumiyama-cho, and a sticker bearing the telephone number in big letters is distributed to each household.

sen.j: 1990年代中期に電話局において宇治市の回線・久御山町の回線をそれぞれ分離して収容することでこの問題は解消された。
sen.e: This problem was solved in the middle of 1990s by installing the telephone lines of Uji City and Kumiyama-cho separately within the telephone exchange station.
This problem was solved in the middle of 1990s by installing the telephone lines of Uji City and Kumiyama-cho separately within the telephone exchange station.
This problem was solved in the middle of 1990s by installing the telephone lines of Uji City and Kumiyama-cho separately within the telephone exchange station.

sen.j: しかしこの方法はNTT西日本の定額通信サービスフレッツISDN提供開始について、0774-4xが対象エリアとなった際、「0774-4xかつ宇治市内」という区分となった。
sen.e: However, because of this solution, the area using 0774-4x in Kumiyama-cho was included in the category of 'areas of 0774-4x and within Uji City,' when all areas using 0774-4x came to be covered by the flat-rate communication service, FLET'S ISDN, started by NTT West.

However, because of this solution, the area using 0774-4x in Kumiyama-cho was included in the category of 'areas of 0774-4x and within Uji City,' when all areas using 0774-4x came to be covered by the flat-rate communication service, FLET'S ISDN, started by NTT West.

However, because of this solution, the area using 0774-4x in Kumiyama-cho was included in the category of 'areas of 0774-4x and within Uji City,' when all areas using 0774-4x came to be covered by the flat-rate communication service, FLET'S ISDN, started by NTT West.

sen.j: フレッツADSLの提供開始についても同様の問題が生じた。
sen.e: A similar problem occurred when the provision of FLET'S ADLS started.
A similar problem occurred when the provision of FLET'S ADLS started.
A similar problem occurred when the provision of FLET'S ADSL started.
